wikipedia_page.main: David Simpson (born 20 July 1983) is an Irish cricketer, from Derry, Northern Ireland. He is a left-handed batsman and a right-arm medium-fast bowler. He has represented Ireland A since 2006, as well as representing the Northern Cricket Union President's XI and the Irish Under-23 team.

response: * David Simpson (Northern Ireland politician) (born 1959), Democratic Unionist Party politician in Northern Ireland
